messages.content:
As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name: '. I will derive this data from the following paragraph: NEW YORK POLICE DEPARTMENT
CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION BUREAU
Counterterrorism Unit
SIGNAL: 89T
ITEM NUMBER: T-89057-24
PAGE 19 of 59
CASE SUPERVISORS:
Lt. Michael Rodriguez
Sgt. Elizabeth Williams
CASE INVESTIGATOR:
Det. Jason Lee
ASSISTING DETECTIVES:
Sgt. Anna Brown
Sgt. Carlos Hernandez
( Intelligence Analysis Unit)
Det. Rachel Green
Det. John Martinez
( Intelligence Analysis Unit)
Det. Emma Wilson
( Intelligence Analysis Unit)
Det. Steven Harris
Det. Katherine Moore
(General Assignment)
Det. Robert Clark
(Surveillance Unit)
Det. Linda Thompson
(Electronic Crimes Unit)
VICTIM:
JOHN DOE, male, security consultant.
DATE, TIME, and
LOCATION of OFFENSE:
15 AUGUST 2024 at approximately 8:30 PM in Midtown Manhattan.
REPORTING OFFICER:
BADGE:
Det. Jason Lee
4389
The investigation, intertwined with complex intelligence and encrypted communications, was challenging. Officer Mitchell, on evening patrol in Midtown Manhattan, was first to detect unusual network activity. He, alongside Sgt. Anna Brown and Patrol Officer Kelly, initiated a rapid response protocol. Technician Johnson, skilled in cyber forensics, worked on decrypting the communications. Criminalist Parker, scrutinizing the intricate digital evidence, pinpointed a breach in the security systems. Coroner Dr. Wright was called to assess a body discovered in an unrelated incident, which unexpectedly provided significant leads to the counterterrorism case. Patrol Officer Ramirez, interacting with nearby businesses, collected insights that were instrumental in piecing together the sequence of events.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.

Officer Name: Lt. Michael Rodriguez Officer Context: Supervised the case in the Counterterrorism Unit. Officer Role: Lieutenant Officer Name: Sgt. Elizabeth Williams Officer Context: Co-supervisor of the case with Lt. Rodriguez. Officer Role: Sergeant Officer Name: Det. Jason Lee Officer Context: Lead investigator for the counterterrorism case, reporting officer. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Sgt. Anna Brown Officer Context: Assisted in the rapid response, part of the Intelligence Analysis Unit. Officer Role: Sergeant Officer Name: Sgt. Carlos Hernandez Officer Context: Intelligence Analysis Unit sergeant, supported the operation. Officer Role: Sergeant Officer Name: Det. Rachel Green Officer Context: Intelligence Analysis Unit detective, contributed to the case. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Det. John Martinez Officer Context: Involved in the case, from the Intelligence Analysis Unit. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Det. Emma Wilson Officer Context: Intelligence Analysis Unit detective, assisted in the investigation. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Det. Steven Harris Officer Context: General assignment detective, part of the investigative team. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Det. Katherine Moore Officer Context: General Assignment detective, assisted in the counterterrorism case. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Det. Robert Clark Officer Context: Surveillance Unit detective, involved in the investigation. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Det. Linda Thompson Officer Context: Electronic Crimes Unit detective, contributed to the case. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Officer Mitchell Officer Context: First to detect unusual network activity in Midtown Manhattan. Officer Role: Patrolling Officer Officer Name: Patrol Officer Kelly Officer Context: Assisted in initiating a rapid response protocol. Officer Role: Patrol Officer Officer Name: Technician Johnson Officer Context: Specialized in cyber forensics, worked on decrypting communications. Officer Role: Forensic Technician Officer Name: Criminalist Parker Officer Context: Analyzed digital evidence, pinpointed a breach in security systems. Officer Role: Criminalist Officer Name: Coroner Dr. Wright Officer Context: Assessed a body in an unrelated incident, provided leads to the case. Officer Role: Medical Examiner Officer Name: Patrol Officer Ramirez Officer Context: Collected insights from nearby businesses, instrumental in the investigation. Officer Role: Community Relations Officer
